description: a(n)=(number of digits <=2)-(number of digits >2) in base 5 representation of n.
maple: A037864 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,5);    for i from 1 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)<=2 then            a := a+1 ;        else            a := a-1 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
